contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 13th day of November, 1998, it is hereby ORDERED that the order of the Superior Court is reversed and the judgment of sentence is vacated. See, Commonwealth v. Crompton, 545 Pa. 586, 682 A.2d 286 (1996); Commonwealth v. Chambers, 528 Pa. 403, 598 A.2d 539 (1991).
CASTILLE and NEWMAN, JJ., dissent.
